From the brand

BurgeonNest Pet Supplies

5 Packs Christmas Puppy Chew Toys will Bring Fun to Your Dog While Improving Dental Health

Heating Pet Pad with Adjustable Timer High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Slow feeder Stainless Steel 4-in-1 Food and Water Bowls with No-Spill Silicone Mat

Super Sturdy Cat Carrier for Large Cats 20 lbs , Medium Cats Under 25 lbs and 2 Cats

Package Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 17.09 x 4.13 x 3.98 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‚Äè : ‚Äé TK-HPP7040A
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé July 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé HIRALIY
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B08CXM511G

7 layer Protection Structure: This pet heating pad is made of soft velvet cover, watertight film, refractory wool and alloy heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure will offer your pet in gentle warming comfort
High Temperature Self-destruct Function: Heated dog pad passes certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct function. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature ,and the heated cat pad will automatically stop working for no more overheating
Against-chew Cord and Washable Velvet Cover: This heating pad for cats uses a bite-proof protective sleeve at the junction of the power cord and the steel cord is 2.1 meters which can withstand 5 KG pull.Quick-drying Soft cover can be take out easily and cleaned by hand
Comfortable and Warming: This heated pet mat can be used in pet houses and nests, also suitable for senior pets, arthritic pets, new born pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury. Help the pet (dog, cat, rabbit, etc.) to keep warm and comfortable in cold winter

BurgeonNest Heating Pad for Your Pets Provide Warmth in the Cold Winter

7 Layer Protection Structure

BurgeonNest pet heating pad is made of soft velvet, refractory wool, MET approved heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure & completely sealed, offers pet’s the most comfortable temperature range ( 86-131‚Ñâ/30-55‚ÑÉ).

High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Our heating pads for dogs passes Certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct funtion. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature, and the dog heated pad will automatically stop working for prevent overheating.

PVC Waterproof Material

Cat bed heater with IP68 Waterproof liner protects from stains and odors etc. It is waterproof material won’t fade, and the material is hardwearing and won’t rip.

Dual Resistant Chew Cord

Cats usually sniff, lick and chew objects to explore everything, this cat warmer pad comes with a steel-wrapped cord to protect dog safety.

Soft Fleece Cover Easy to Clean

The soft velvet cover is removable, so you can machine wash it.

How to Clean: Remove the cover and wash it with hand or washing machine. Do not plug in until the heated pet pad is completely dry.

A luxurious 8″ flush, high definition E Ink Carta 1200 touchscreen

Capture your imagination and every thought

Product Description

Car Battery Charger 12V/10A 24V/5A

30% FASTER QUICK CHARGER

12V 10-Amp and 24V 5-Amp 7-stage quick battery charger, charging speed is much faster than 8-Amp or 5-Amp automatic chargers.

HIGH-EFFICIENCY PULSE REPAIR

Automatically detects battery sulfation and acid stratification, take newest pulse repair function to restore lost battery performance for stronger engine starts and extended battery life.

8 CHARGING PROTECTION

Smart control, temp compensation in hot climates and under-charging in cold climates, reverse protection, cooling system, overcurrent, fireproof material, overvoltage, short circuit.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS Input voltageÔºöAC:110-220V (50-60HZ) Output voltage: 12V-15.5V/24V-31V Output current: DC = 12V10A/24V5A(Max) Dimensions: 158*95*62mm Net weight: 560g

Great cooling system

There is a cooling fan design at the bottom of the battery charger, which has powerful heat dissipation function, which can operate the battery charger for a long time and keep it in a low temperature state without damaging the battery charger.

Safer alligator clip and Pure copper wire

Rugged and durable, alligator clip wrapped in insulating material.The use of international standard pure copper wire can output current stably, even if the charging wire is used for a long time, it will not generate heat and is not dangerous.

Flame retardant shell material solid

The use of ABS Flame-retardant shell has features of fireproof, anti-electric shock, anti-corrosion, strong.

Charging Current
5 Amp 8 Amp 10 Amp

Output Current
5A 12V/8A & 24V/4A 10A 12V & 5A 24V

12V Repair Mode

‚úì

‚úì

‚úì

Multi-Safety Protections

‚úì

‚úì

‚úì

Input Voltage
100-240VAC 50/60Hz 100-240V 50-60Hz 100-240V 50-60HZ

All in One – Battery Charger automotive 10-Amp 12V and 24V Fully-Automatic Smart, It’s smaller but delivers more power. It’s the all-in-one solution battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, plus battery desulfator. Charge or repair all 12V and 24V lead-acid automotive, marine, and deep-cycle batteries, including AGM, GEL, SLA, and Flooded in cars, trucks, SUVs, motorcycles, lawnmowers, boats, marine, etc. LITHIUM BATTERIES ARE NOT ALLOWED
Restore your Battery – Built-in advanced battery REPAIR mode to help to recover old/idle batteries and extend battery life. If the car battery charger cannot charge the battery, please use repair mode. The high-frequency and low-frequency pulse technology has good repair and activation effects. Note: It can not activate a dead battery or repair a damaged battery.
Enjoy Precision Charging – Using a backlit LCD, the battery charger automotive clearly and visibly shows an LCD screen displaying the charging status and battery status; An integrated thermal sensor detects the ambient temperature and alters the charge to eliminate over-charging in hot climates and under-charging in cold climates.
8 Charging Protection – The charging cable contains heat-resistant and oxidation-resistant copper wire, which is not easy to break. It has protection circuits such as overcharge/overvoltage/overcurrent/short course, with functions such as overcurrent protection, short circuit protection, reverse connection protection, overheat protection, overvoltage protection, and Undervoltage protection.
Intelligent Memory – The Car Battery Charger mode has a memory function. After charging, it defaults to the state mode used before the last power failure. Bright memory is convenient to use. (Repair mode without memory function) Note: It can’t jump start the car, only the battery charging function. Requires power connection

Enjoy Happy Driving

Provide a variety of accessories required for the car

Adjustable Speed & Temperature: Strong and stable motor equips this dog blow dryer with several speed and temperature levels. Maximum Wind Speed: 72m/s; Temperature Range: 95‚Ñâ-135‚Ñâ. The dryer will stop working immediately if the temperature is too high because it has a built-in temperature control protection system.
Multifunctional Use: This pet blow dryer is equipped with 4 different nozzles to meet different drying needs for different pets. For your various needs, the pet hair dryer can also be used to dry your car, floors, furniture, etc.
Low Noise & Heat Insulation: The unique hose design, thickened metal case and noise reduction structure make the dog dryer 5-15 decibels lower than others when used, so it is suitable for sensitive dogs. The hose holder is thermal insulation for safe use.

From the brand

For years, we have a love affair with multifunctional desk lamp. Our passion led us to design and produce the best desk lamp because you deserve the best. Our product provides consistent excellence quality and do it effortlessly. And we strive to provide all our customers from around the world with sincere service. It is our greatest honor to make you satisfied.

More than just lamp

LCD FUNCTION: You can press “On/Off button” for 3 seconds to turn on/off the LCD screen light. Includes a digital clock for time, date and temperature display. Set an alarm or time for your desk light. Remove clutter from your office desk!
EYE CARE TECH: Bright and eco-friendly LED lighting with an anti-glare shade. 5 levels of adjustable brightness for clear reading and studying without eye strain.
THREE MODULES: 3 colors temperature available(Warm White/ Natural White/ Cold White) for work(office), reading(studying), relaxation(bedroom) and more.
FOLDABLE DESIGN: LED desk lamp with 180 degree flexible arm and 90 degree base axis. The foldable design saves space and you can carry it anywhere in the office, living room, bedroom, dormitory and any other places.

Read more

Read more

Sleep Mode (Can turn off the blue light)

Intimate design, Long press the power button for 3 seconds to turn on / off the LCD display blue light, so you won’t be disturbed when you sleep at night.

Wireless charging & USB Charging Port

Suitable for Mobile phones with QI Wireless Charging Function.

Charge your mobile devices and keep them with reach.

A Light for All Occasions

From work to study, from reading to rest, this desk lamp provides all the lighting you need.

Read more

Eye-Caring Table Lamp

No flicker, less blue light and no glare lighting can protect your eyes from fatigue and vision

loss during reading drawing, working, etc.

Touch Control & Phone Holder

Light touch dimming, the light color temperature and brightness intensity can be adjusted freely.

Hiding smartphone holder, convenient for prop it up for viewing.

Perfect Gift Box

Perfect for anyone: A gift that everyone would love. Beautifully packaged and gift-ready for any occasion such as birthdays to special holidays.
